thread.title: *HOT* $3/1 ANY Huggies Diapers Coupon = Only $3.49 Each at Rite Aid (Starting 2/5) + More Deals
thread.title_full: *HOT* $3/1 ANY Huggies Diapers Coupon = Only $3.49 Each at Rite Aid (Starting 2/5) + More Deals

author: Mary (Stellar Sidekick)
title: *HOT* $3/1 ANY Huggies Diapers Coupon = Only $3.49 Each at Rite Aid (Starting 2/5) + More Deals
text:
*HOT* Diaper Coupon Alert! Hurry on over to Coupons.com where you can print this NEW and super high value $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) coupon , valid only for two weeks after printing. After printing, check out all of the deals you can score below – valid this week and/or starting 2/5!

Rite Aid Deal Idea (starting 2/5): Huggies Jumbo Pack Diapers and Pull-Ups 18-35 ct or Goodnites 9-18 ct $8.99 
Buy 4 Huggies Jumbo Pack Diapers $8.99 each
Total = $35.96
Use four $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) printable coupons 
Pay $23.96
Get 1000 Plenti Points when you buy $30 = $10 (limit 2; exp 2/25)
Final Cost $13.96 total – just $3.49 each!

CVS Deal Idea (starting 2/5): Spend $20 on Jumbo Pk. Huggies Diapers, Pull-Ups, GoodNites or Tru-Fit Refills Pk. 2/$19.97 = $5 EB (limit 1) 
Buy 2 Huggies Diapers Jumbo Pk 2/$19.97 (should print ECB)
Use two $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) printable coupons 
Pay $13.97
Get back $5 EB
Final cost $8.97 – just $4.48 each!

Walgreens Deal Idea (starting 2/5): Spend $30 on Participating Pampers, Huggies or Well Beginnings Select Wipes, Diapers or Training Pants = 10,000 Bonus Points ($10 reward)
Buy 3 Huggies Jumbo Pack Diapers $11.99 each
Total = $35.97
Use three $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) printable coupons
Pay $26.97
Get back 10,000 Bonus Points ($10 reward) + 350 EveryDay Points (35¢ reward)
Final cost after points $16.62 – just $5.54 each!

Target Deal Idea (thru 2/4): This week there is a FREE $25 Target Gift Card with select baby purchase of $100 or more coupon available in the ad! This offer includes diapers, training pants, baby wipes, formula, baby food and toiletries. You should also be able to find this coupon on the Cartwheel app OR by texting SAVE25 to 827438 to have it delivered to your smartphone. This offer is also available online at Target.com .
Buy 4 Huggies Super Pack Diapers $24.99 each
Buy 1 Huggies Wipes 56ct $1.97 
Total = $101.93
Scan the FREE $25 Target Gift Card with select baby purchase of $100 or more coupon found in the ad, on the Cartwheel app OR by texting SAVE25 to 827438 
Use four $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) printable coupons 
Use the $0.50/1 Huggies Wipes printable coupon 
Pay $89.43
Get back a FREE $25 Target Gift Card
Final cost $64.43 total – like paying $16.11 per diaper pack plus free wipes!

OR, score this Target Deal Idea (starting 2/5): Buy 2 Huggies Snug & Dry super pack diapers $24.99 each 
Total = $49.98
Use two $3/1 any package of Huggies Diapers (excluding 9ct or less) printable coupons 
Pay $43.98
Get back a FREE $10 Target Gift Card
Final cost $33.98, just $16.99 each!
